title: Integrated Visual and Academic Literacy Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and understanding of foundational social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Developing theoretical and practical competencies in parallel through job-related social issue analysis and visual material production in VR simulation environments, with an emphasis on collaborative learning using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can utilize visual materials such as infographics and diagrams with over 80% accuracy when analyzing social phenomena in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can present solutions to workplace problems by integrating academic texts and visual materials in at least three practical projects.
Learners can evaluate the visual and academic coherence of submitted project deliverables at a minimum of 3 points on a 4-point scale through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
